comments: This contract is a multi-year contract. This contract includes one or more options. This contract includes one or more amendments. This contract was awarded by Public Works and Government Services Canada against a procurement tool. This contract was competitively sourced. For a contract with task authorizations, the realized amount of the contract is contingent on the number of task authorizations issued and may be less than the amount proactively disclosed, dependant on the operational requirements of the department.
